languages.text: "Я предполагаю, что дело не в десятине. Она лишь предлог, чтобы держать нас здесь достаточно долго, но зачем? Подыграем им. Пусть считают, что мы проглотили наживку, а при подходящем случае перехватим контроль над ситуацией — для этого нужен условный сигнал, чтобы провести скоординированную атаку".

traits.locale_text: "Нас заманили сюда явно не просто так. И едва ли предполагается, что мы вернемся. Но ситуация требует более тщательного расследования — в ходе которого легко нажить недоброжелателей. Подыграем им. Пусть считают, что мы проглотили наживку. Пока".

languages.text: "My hypothesis is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along for now. Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."
languages.original_text: "Я предполагаю, что дело не в десятине. Она лишь предлог, чтобы держать нас здесь достаточно долго, но зачем? Подыграем им. Пусть считают, что мы проглотили наживку, а при подходящем случае перехватим контроль над ситуацией — для этого нужен условный сигнал, чтобы провести скоординированную атаку".

traits.locale_text: "My guess is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along. Let them think we have swallowed the bait while we wait for a good opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

Let them think we have swallowed the bait while we wait for a good opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

languages.text: "Meine Hypothese ist, dass es hier nicht um den Zehnt geht. Das ist lediglich ein Vorwand, um uns lange genug hierzubehalten. Nur zu welchem Zweck? Wir sollten vorerst mitspielen. Lassen wir sie glauben, dass wir den Köder geschluckt haben, bis sich eine Gelegenheit bietet, die Kontrolle zu übernehmen. Dafür müssen wir uns auf ein Signal einigen, auf das hin wir einen koordinierten Angriff starten."
languages.original_text: "My hypothesis is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along for now. Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Hypothese ist, dass es hier nicht um den Zehnt geht. Das ist lediglich ein Vorwand, um uns lange genug hierzubehalten. Nur zu welchem Zweck? Wir sollten vorerst mitspielen. Lassen wir sie glauben, dass wir den Köder geschluckt haben, bis sich eine Gelegenheit bietet, die Kontrolle zu übernehmen. Dafür müssen wir uns auf ein Signal einigen, auf das hin wir einen koordinierten Angriff starten."

languages.text: « À mon avis, ça n'a rien à voir avec la dîme, qui n'est qu'un prétexte pour nous forcer à prolonger notre séjour ici. Mais dans quel but ? Pour le moment, nous devrions continuer à jouer le jeu. Faisons-leur croire que nous avons mordu à l'hameçon en attendant l'occasion de prendre le contrôle de la situation. Dans cette optique, nous devons déterminer un signal à donner pour lancer une attaque coordonnée. »
languages.original_text: "My hypothesis is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along for now. Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

traits.locale_text: « À mon avis, ça n'a rien à voir avec la dîme, qui n'est qu'un prétexte pour nous forcer à prolonger notre séjour ici. Mais dans quel but ? Pour le moment, nous devrions continuer à jouer le jeu. Faisons-leur croire que nous avons mordu à l'hameçon en attendant l'occasion de prendre le contrôle de la situation. Dans cette optique, nous devons déterminer un signal à donner pour lancer une attaque coordonnée. »

languages.text: 「私の仮説では、本当の目的は租税ではありません。それはただの口実にすぎず、私たちを十分な時間、ここに引き留めるためのものです。ですが、何のために？今はしばらく話を合わせておきましょう。彼らには、こちらがまんまと餌に食いついたと思わせておくのです。そして、状況を掌握するチャンスを待ちます。そのためには、連携攻撃を開始する合図を決めておく必要があります」
languages.original_text: "My hypothesis is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along for now. Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

traits.locale_text: 「私の仮説では、本当の目的は租税ではありません。それはただの口実にすぎず、私たちを十分な時間、ここに引き留めるためのものです。ですが、何のために？今はしばらく話を合わせておきましょう。彼らには、こちらがまんまと餌に食いついたと思わせておくのです。そして、状況を掌握するチャンスを待ちます。そのためには、連携攻撃を開始する合図を決めておく必要があります」

languages.text: «Mi hipótesis es que esto no tiene nada que ver con el diezmo. Es solo un pretexto para retenernos aquí, aunque desconozco el motivo. Deberíamos seguirles el juego. Que crean que hemos mordido el anzuelo mientras esperamos la ocasión de tomar el control de la situación. Para ello, necesitaremos una señal para lanzar un ataque coordinado».
languages.original_text: "My hypothesis is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along for now. Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

traits.locale_text: «Mi hipótesis es que esto no tiene nada que ver con el diezmo. Es solo un pretexto para retenernos aquí, aunque desconozco el motivo. Deberíamos seguirles el juego. Que crean que hemos mordido el anzuelo mientras esperamos la ocasión de tomar el control de la situación. Para ello, necesitaremos una señal para lanzar un ataque coordinado».

languages.text: “我的猜测是，这一切应该和什一税无关。所有的事情都仅仅是个借口，想尽可能地把我们留在这里，可这么做又是出于什么原因呢？我们可以配合他们一下，让他们以为我们已经上钩了，但实际上，我们是在等待机会，控制局面。为了实现这个目标，我们需要确定一下发动协同攻击的信号。”
languages.original_text: "My hypothesis is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along for now. Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

traits.locale_text: “我的猜测是，这一切应该和什一税无关。所有的事情都仅仅是个借口，想尽可能地把我们留在这里，可这么做又是出于什么原因呢？我们可以配合他们一下，让他们以为我们已经上钩了，但实际上，我们是在等待机会，控制局面。为了实现这个目标，我们需要确定一下发动协同攻击的信号。”

languages.text: "Bana kalırsa mesele, aşar değil. Amaçları bizi burada mümkün olduğunca uzun tutmak ama neden? Şimdilik sularına gidelim ki oltaya geldiğimizi sansınlar. O sırada durumu kontrol altına almak için fırsat kollayalım. Bu yüzden ortaklaşa saldırı için bir işaret belirleyelim derim."
languages.original_text: "My hypothesis is that this is not about the tithe. That is merely a pretext to keep us here long enough — but what for? We should play along for now. Let them think we've taken the bait while we wait for an opportunity to seize control of the situation. For that, we need to agree on a signal to launch a coordinated attack."

traits.locale_text: "Bana kalırsa mesele, aşar değil. Amaçları, bizi burada mümkün olduğunca uzun tutmak ama neden? Şimdilik sularına gidelim ki oltaya geldiğimizi sansınlar. O sırada durumu kontrol altına almak için fırsat kollayalım. Bu yüzden ortaklaşa saldırı için bir işaret belirleyelim derim."
